meaningMnemonic: If your <kanji>neglect</kanji> of family members goes too <kanji>far</kanji> you'll end up with <vocabulary>estrangement</vocabulary> in your relationships with them. And they'll probably <vocabulary>neglect</vocabulary> you as much as you neglect them.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
